description: spotlight on face of figure holding a camera to eye - head and hands only in picture; lens of camera and flash appear in position of eyes
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, Inscription and Stamp

on back, in pencil: [Print made in Time-Life Photo Lab, 1992], [(c) Time Warner Inc. / All Rights Reserved] and [RM Li #FS 9612-025-C]
markings: on back, stamped in black and in pencil: [THIS IMAGE IS LIMITED TO FIFTY / PLUS TEN ORIGINAL SILVER PRINTS / OF WHICH THIS IS NUMBER 29/50+10]
signed: on back, in pencil: [The Photojournalist, 1955 by Andreas Feininger]; on back, in black ink: [Andreas Feininger]
title: The Photojournalist
